backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing authenticated user profiles and item CRUD with owner-based access control and admin overrides using a shared AccessControl state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two game-generation improvements, listing affected frontend files, components, test IDs, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten high-level summaries of frontend source files covering routing, authentication, error handling, runtimes, and game-generation enhancements.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base stylesheet defining design tokens, light/dark themes, and global layout styles for the application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads the Vite/TypeScript main module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring TanStack Router routes for builder, library, viewers, shared content, and downloaded creations within the AppShell layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Reusable sign-in/sign-out button integrating Internet Identity, handling edge cases, and clearing React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal dialog prompting first-time users to create a profile, with form validation, async save, and normalized error display.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAuth: Authentication guard component that shows loading, sign-in prompt, or protected content based on current user state.
frontend/src/components/download/Android: Dialog UI offering Android export options, including direct HTML download or advanced setup instructions.
frontend/src/components/download/Downloa: Modal dialog shown after a download completes, displaying file info, format-specific icon/labels, and actions to open the file in-app (JSON only) or close.
Top-level application layout with header, footer navigation, and routed content, enforcing light mode and handling authentication-related UI like login and profile setup.
frontend/src/components/library/Creation: Renders a single saved creation with actions to open, download in multiple formats, share/unshare, and delete, managing download state, errors, and post-download dialogs.
frontend/src/components/preview/Creation: Dispatch component that selects and renders the correct runtime preview (app, website, chatbot, image, or game) based on creation type.
frontend/src/components/runtime/AppRunti: Runtime preview for generated apps, rendering either a calculator or a task-list style app with interactive state based on app data.
frontend/src/components/runtime/Calculat: Fully interactive calculator runtime supporting basic and scientific operations, managing expression state and evaluating safely.
frontend/src/components/runtime/ChatbotR: Simple chatbot runtime with a message list, input box, and keyword-based or random canned responses.
frontend/src/components/runtime/GameRunt: Canvas-based 2D game runtime handling player movement, input, game state, scoring, and rendering using normalized game data.
frontend/src/components/runtime/ImageRun: Displays a generated image preview or fallback emoji/description with optional caption in a styled container.
frontend/src/components/runtime/WebsiteR: Renders a simple multi-page website preview with tab-like buttons to switch pages and a card displaying page title, content, and optional image placeholder.
frontend/src/components/system/AsyncStat: Displays a destructive error alert with an optional retry button for handling async operation errors, otherwise renders nothing.
frontend/src/components/system/ErrorBoun: React error boundary that catches rendering errors and shows a fallback UI with options to reset to a safe route or reload the page.
frontend/src/components/viewer/ViewerHea: Provides header actions for a creation viewer including download (multiple formats), share/unshare, copy link, delete, and related dialogs with error handling.
frontend/src/generation/detectGameKind.t: Detects a game kind from a prompt using prioritized keyword scoring and returns the detected kind with confidence and reasoning, plus a helper to get display labels.
frontend/src/generation/gameSchema.ts: Normalizes arbitrary input into a valid GameData object by applying defaults and validating fields like game kind, difficulty, theme, and settings.
frontend/src/generation/gameTemplates.ts: Defines preset game templates for each game kind (runner, shooter, catch, puzzle, space) with titles, themes, settings, objectives, and progression data.
frontend/src/generation/templates.ts: Main prompt-based generator that simulates creation for apps, websites, chatbots, images, or games by routing to type-specific generation logic.
frontend/src/generation/types.ts: Contains shared TypeScript types for creation drafts, app data, and detailed game data schemas used across the generation system.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a React hook that creates and caches a backend actor based on the current Internet Identity, initializing access control when authenticated. It invalidates and refetches dependent React Query queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCanvasFit.ts: Defines a hook that automatically sizes and scales a canvas to fit its container with a fixed aspect ratio and device pixel ratio support. It also exposes a helper to map pointer coordinates to canvas coordinates.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Combines Internet Identity state with a query for the caller’s user profile to expose authentication status, principal, display name, and loading flags. It normalizes user data for easy consumption by components.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout, stored identities, and detailed login status flags. Exposes a hook to access identity and auth actions throughout the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains React Query hooks for interacting with backend actor methods, including fetching and mutating user profiles and items. Handles authorization errors gracefully and coordinates cache invalidation after mutations.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind CSS base, component, and utility layers with a custom light color theme and CSS variables. Includes global styles and utility classes for safe areas, touch targets, and layout behavior.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React application by rendering the root component and wiring up React Query and Internet Identity providers. Imports global styles and mounts the app to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/BuilderPage.tsx: Implements the main creation workflow UI where users enter prompts, generate content of various types, preview results, and save creations. Manages generation state, game type detection, and navigation after saving.
frontend/src/pages/CreationViewerPage.ts: Displays a saved creation by fetching it by ID, handling loading and error states, and rendering a preview. Provides navigation back to the user’s creations and header actions for the viewed item.
frontend/src/pages/DownloadedCreationVie: Page that loads the last downloaded creation JSON from sessionStorage and displays its metadata and preview, with error and loading states and a back button to My Creations.
frontend/src/pages/MyCreationsPage.tsx: Authenticated page that lists the current user’s saved creations, handling loading, error, empty states, and navigation to create a new project.
frontend/src/pages/SharedViewerPage.tsx: Public viewer for a shared creation fetched by ID, parsing stored JSON content and rendering a preview with basic not-found and error handling.
frontend/src/services/errors.ts: Utility that normalizes various backend, network, parsing, and export errors into short, user-friendly error messages.
frontend/src/utils/download.ts: Handles downloading creations in JSON, HTML, or Android instruction formats, triggering browser downloads and storing the last JSON download in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/exportAndroidProjectZ: Placeholder exporter that generates a text file with step-by-step instructions for manually creating an Android app using a WebView.
frontend/src/utils/exportCreationHtml.ts: Generates a fully self-contained HTML file for different creation types (app, website, chatbot, image, game) with embedded styles and scripts.
frontend/src/utils/exportedGameRuntime.t: Generates a self-contained JavaScript game runtime script string from GameData, wiring canvas rendering, input handling, game state, spawning, collisions, HUD updates, and overlays for start/pause/game over.
frontend/src/utils/safeMathEval.ts: Implements a safe math expression evaluator using tokenization and the shunting-yard algorithm, supporting basic operators, functions, constants, and parentheses without using eval.
frontend/src/utils/shareLinks.ts: Provides helpers to generate share URLs for items and copy them to the clipboard, with a fallback mechanism for older browsers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions to read URL parameters from query or hash routes, persist them in sessionStorage, retrieve or clear them, and safely manage sensitive params across navigation.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining content paths, plugins, container settings, and extensive theme extensions for colors, spacing, animations, and design tokens.
project_state.json: Structured snapshot of the project’s current scope, goals, and implemented features, including RBAC, authentication, item persistence, sharing, and frontend-backend integration details.
